mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM room WHERE type LIKE '%' || #{type} || '%'

SELECT rid, type, people, price, useyn, regdate FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY type) rn, rid, type, people, price, useyn, regdate FROM room WHERE type LIKE '%' || #{type} || '%') WHERE rn <= #{criteria.pageNum} * #{criteria.rowsPerPage} AND rn > (#{criteria.pageNum} - 1) * #{criteria.rowsPerPage} ORDER BY rid DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO room(rid, type, people, price, image) VALUES(room_seq.NEXTVAL, #{type}, #{people}, #{price}, #{image})
